data.title: Country Profile Equatorial Guinea
data.meta_description: Read more about Equatorial Guinea's budget profile here...
data.text:
Region: Central Africa

Currency: Central African CFA franc (XAF)

Population: 0.82 million

Capital: Malabo

Ministry website: www.mef.gov.gn/

Fiscal year: January - December

Regional Economic Community: ECCAS

Budgets in Africa

Key Budget Indicators Over Time 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 GDP (constant 2006 XAF[billions]) 7,342.58 6,673.67 6,085.27 5,740.41 5,407.39 GDP (current XAF[billions]) 10,746.85 7,795.42 6,661.37 7,084.54 7,564.71 GDP growth (%) 0.42 -9.11 -8.82 -5.67 -5.8 GDP per capita (constant 2006 XAF) 6,501,174.4 5,677,839.44 4,981,837.39 4,528,245.76 4,115,542.39 GDP per capita (current XAF) 9,515,338.79 6,632,203.96 5,453,474.85 5,588,549.72 5,757,474.75 Inflation (CPI) (%) 4.3 1.7 1.4 0.75 1.35 General government revenue (% of GDP) 24.06 26.47 16.9 17.48 19.12 General government expenditure (% of GDP) 31.6 41.57 27.82 20.07 18.61 Budget balance (% of GDP) -7.54 -15.1 -10.92 -2.59 0.51 Primary balance (% of GDP) -7.08 -14.71 -10.51 -2.17 1.14 General government debt (% of GDP) 12.56 31.66 41.14 36.24 39.15 Population (millions) 1.13 1.18 1.22 1.27 1.31
